What kind of product you would like to build?
Who are the people who’d be your early adopters?
Who you’d sell the product to?
How much you’d like to make from the product (cost & profit margins)
How long you’d take to build the product?
What your goals are to scale?
What kind of kid entrepreneur do you consider yourself to be?
How would you like others to perceive you as a human being?
Finally, ask “What If” questions to envision how this innovation will handle challenges of the future?
